param.name: maxUpload
param.label: Max file upload (bytes)
param.description: Maximum upload file size for project files in bites (master default set to 100MB (104857600 bytes))

param.name: maxDownload
param.label: Max size for batch download (bytes)
param.description: Maximum download file size for zipped project files in bites (master default set to 100MB (104857600 bytes))

param.name: tempPath
param.label: Temp file directory
param.description: File path for storing temp files during batch download
